类的使用
Card

    • <Unnamed>中Card的使用

      <Unnamed>中Card的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BigTwoCard
      This class is a subclass of the Card class, and is used to model a card used in a Big Two card game.
      返回Card的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Card CardList.getCard(int i)
      Returns the card at the specified position in this list.
      Card Quad.getTopCard() 
      Card FullHouse.getTopCard() 
      Card Hand.getTopCard()
      A method for retrieving the top card of this hand
      Card CardList.removeCard(int i)
      Removes the card at the specified position in this list.
      Card CardList.setCard(int i, Card card)
      Replaces the card at the specified position in this list with the specified card.
      参数类型为Card的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CardGamePlayer.addCard(Card card)
      Adds the specified card to this player.
      void CardList.addCard(Card card)
      Appends the specified card to the end of this list.
      int Card.compareTo(Card card)
      Compares this card with the specified card for order.
      int BigTwoCard.compareTo(Card card)
      Compares this card with the specified card for order.
      boolean CardList.contains(Card card)
      Returns true if this list contains the specified card.
      boolean CardList.removeCard(Card card)
      Removes the first occurrence of the specified card from this list, if it is present.
      Card CardList.setCard(int i, Card card)
      Replaces the card at the specified position in this list with the specified card.
